https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/alNGJyTCcqnk0ilV7RMrpA8yzkZ.jpg Follows a Palestinian leader who unites Fatah, Hamas and Israelis in an unarmed movement to save his village from destruction. Success eludes them until his 15-year-old daughter jumps into the fray. Budrus
